alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 2:12AM EST until December 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Sumter, Coastal Citrus, Coastal Hernando, Inland Hernando and Inland Pasco Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM EST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter
